description: Placeholder text for the media URL input
defaultMessage: Add a URL to a social media post or webpage, or a block of text.

description: Subtitle for the section of the media that contains the claim being created
defaultMessage: The media that contains the claim.

description: Label for the text input for claim title
This will appear between two mutually exclusive inputs. If the user fills in one, then the other will be disabled.
Label on a button that the user clicks in order to return a file upload box back to its 'empty' state.
